## throttle() function

函数节流

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function throttle<T extends (...args: unknown[]) => unknown>(func: T, timeFrame: number, immediately?: boolean): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  func | T | 需要节流的函数 |
|  timeFrame | number | 时间间隔 |
|  immediately | boolean | _(Optional)_ 是否立即执行 |

**Returns:**

T

节流后的函数
